
R3 TEST


2^13 + 2^4 = 8202 = 0x2010


11110      0010000000000000
R30 gets 2^13 in its slices. 000, 001, 010, 011, 100, 101, 110, 111

0000001000000000000011110
0001001000000000000011110
0010001000000000000011110
0011001000000000000011110
0100001000000000000011110
0101001000000000000011110
0110001000000000000011110
0111001000000000000011110




11001      0000000000010000
R25 gets 2^4 in its slices.  000, 001, 010, 011, 100, 101, 110, 111

0000000000000001000011001
0001000000000001000011001
0010000000000001000011001
0011000000000001000011001
0100000000000001000011001
0101000000000001000011001
0110000000000001000011001
0111000000000001000011001



01010
reg 10 gets the result. 

OPCODE:

1100000100110011111001010

NOP 
1100000000000000000000000


0000001000000000000011110
0001001000000000000011110
0010001000000000000011110
0011001000000000000011110
0100001000000000000011110
0101001000000000000011110
0110001000000000000011110
0111001000000000000011110
0000000000000001000011001
0001000000000001000011001
0010000000000001000011001
0011000000000001000011001
0100000000000001000011001
0101000000000001000011001
0110000000000001000011001
0111000000000001000011001
1100000100110011111001010


passes.
